choices: The Company’s Core Values set the framework for the desired behavior of people within the organization and create the Company’s identity

questions.question: Which of the following best explains The MLC comprises three different but related parts: the Articles, the Regulations and the Code?
choices: The MLC comprises three different but related parts: the Articles, the Regulations and the Code

choices: Report any hazardous condition or operation to the Senior Officers or relevant OOW

choices: There is no universally accepted definition for fatigue
